outputs.name: ghe
outputs.description:
A Dragonfly Ground Heat Exchanger object that can be used within an
District Energy System (DES).

inputs.name: _geo
inputs.description:
A horizontal Rhino surface representing a footprint to be converted
into a Ground Heat Exchanger.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description:
Text to set the name for the Ground Heat Exchanger, which will also
be incorporated into unique Ground Heat Exchanger identifier.
If the name is not provided, a random one will be assigned.

inputs.name: _soil_conduct_
inputs.description: A number for the soil conductivity in W/m-K. (Default: 2.3).

inputs.name: _soil_heat_cap_
inputs.description:
A number for the volumetric heat capacity of the soil
in J/m3-K. (Default: 2,343,500).

inputs.name: _soil_temper_
inputs.description:
A number the undisturbed annual average soil temperature in
degrees Celsius. If unspecified, this value will be the average EPW
temperature.

inputs.name: _bore_length_
inputs.description:
A number for the length of the borehole in meters. This is the
distance from the bottom of the heat exchanging part of the borehole
to the top. (Default: 96).

inputs.name: _bore_depth_
inputs.description:
A number for the depth below the ground surface at which
the top of the heat exchanging part of the borehole sits in
meters. (Default: 2).

name: DF Ground Heat Exchanger
description:
Create a Ground Heat Exchanger for a District Energy System (DES) from its
footprint geometry (horizontal Rhino surfaces).
-
